languages.text: {n}Ксенос отвечает исполненным самодовольства смешком.{/n} "Страх — реакция на непостижимое, рождаемая слабым умом. Даже наши владыки ему подвержены... О, знал{mf||а} бы ты, сколько усилий пришлось потратить, чтобы убедить архонта притащить духовных воинов в Темный город, чтобы спрятать следы пространственного коллапса, что испятнали весь шпиль".

{n}The xenos responds with a self-satisfied chuckle.{/n} "Fear is the reaction of a weak mind presented with the inconceivable. Even our masters are liable to it... Oh, the pains it took me to convince the Archon to bring the spirit warriors into the Dark City. And to then conceal the evidence of the dimensional collapse that had destabilised the spire."
languages.original_text: {n}Ксенос отвечает исполненным самодовольства смешком.{/n} "Страх — реакция на непостижимое, рождаемая слабым умом. Даже наши владыки ему подвержены... О, знал{mf||а} бы ты, сколько усилий пришлось потратить, чтобы убедить архонта притащить духовных воинов в Темный город, чтобы спрятать следы пространственного коллапса, что испятнали весь шпиль".

Oh, the pains it took me to convince the Archon to bring the spirit warriors into the Dark City. And to then conceal the evidence of the dimensional collapse that had destabilised the spire."

Oh, the pains it took me to convince the Archon to bring the spirit warriors into the Dark City. And to then conceal the evidence of the dimensional collapse that had destabilised the spire."

Oh, the pains it took me to convince the Archon to bring the spirit warriors into the Dark City. And to then conceal the evidence of the dimensional collapse that had destabilised the spire."

Oh, the pains it took me to convince the Archon to bring the spirit warriors into the Dark City. And to then conceal the evidence of the dimensional collapse that had destabilised the spire."

languages.text: {n}異種族は自己満足的な笑みを浮かべながら答える。{/n}「恐怖は、創造を超えるものを目の当たりにした弱者の反応だ。我らの主ですらも、そのような振る舞いを取り得る…ああ、仄暗き都へと、精霊の戦士を連れて行くようにアーコンを説得するのはなかなか大変だった。そして、尖塔を不安定化させた、次元崩壊の証拠を隠すのもな」
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos responds with a self-satisfied chuckle.{/n} "Fear is the reaction of a weak mind presented with the inconceivable. Even our masters are liable to it... Oh, the pains it took me to convince the Archon to bring the spirit warriors into the Dark City. And to then conceal the evidence of the dimensional collapse that had destabilised the spire."

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族は自己満足的な笑みを浮かべながら答える。{/n}「恐怖は、創造を超えるものを目の当たりにした弱者の反応だ。我らの主ですらも、そのような振る舞いを取り得る…ああ、仄暗き都へと、精霊の戦士を連れて行くようにアーコンを説得するのはなかなか大変だった。そして、尖塔を不安定化させた、次元崩壊の証拠を隠すのもな」

languages.text: {n}血伶人发出了得意的笑声。{/n}“只有当软弱的心灵面对无法理解的事情时，才会感到恐惧，就连我们的主人也会犯下这样的错误……噢，为了说服执政官，把那些灵魂战士带进黑暗之城，我真是费了不少心血。为了把尖塔次元坍缩的证据隐藏起来，我也花了很大力气。”
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos responds with a self-satisfied chuckle.{/n} "Fear is the reaction of a weak mind presented with the inconceivable. Even our masters are liable to it... Oh, the pains it took me to convince the Archon to bring the spirit warriors into the Dark City. And to then conceal the evidence of the dimensional collapse that had destabilised the spire."

traits.locale_text: {n}血伶人发出了得意的笑声。{/n}“只有当软弱的心灵面对无法理解的事情时，才会感到恐惧，就连我们的主人也会犯下这样的错误……噢，为了说服执政官，把那些灵魂战士带进黑暗之城，我真是费了不少心血。为了把尖塔次元坍缩的证据隐藏起来，我也花了很大力气。”

languages.text: {n}Le xénos répond avec un rire suffisant.{/n} « La peur est la réaction des esprits faibles face à l'inconcevable. Même nos maîtres y sont sujets... Oh, la douleur qu'il a fallu que j'inflige pour convaincre l'archonte d'emmener les esprits guerriers dans la Cité Crépusculaire, puis pour faire disparaître les preuves de l'effondrement dimensionnel qui avait déstabilisé la tour. »
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos responds with a self-satisfied chuckle.{/n} "Fear is the reaction of a weak mind presented with the inconceivable. Even our masters are liable to it... Oh, the pains it took me to convince the Archon to bring the spirit warriors into the Dark City. And to then conceal the evidence of the dimensional collapse that had destabilised the spire."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le xénos répond avec un rire suffisant.{/n} « La peur est la réaction des esprits faibles face à l'inconcevable. Même nos maîtres y sont sujets... Oh, la douleur qu'il a fallu que j'inflige pour convaincre l'archonte d'emmener les esprits guerriers dans la Cité Crépusculaire, puis pour faire disparaître les preuves de l'effondrement dimensionnel qui avait déstabilisé la tour. »

languages.text: {n}El xenos responde con una risa satisfecha.{/n} «El miedo es la reacción de una mente débil al enfrentarse a lo inconcebible. Incluso nuestros amos son susceptibles a él... Lo que me costó convencer a la Arconte de que trajera a los guerreros espirituales a la Ciudad Siniestra. Y después, de que ocultara las pruebas del colapso dimensional que ponía en peligro la torre».
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos responds with a self-satisfied chuckle.{/n} "Fear is the reaction of a weak mind presented with the inconceivable. Even our masters are liable to it... Oh, the pains it took me to convince the Archon to bring the spirit warriors into the Dark City. And to then conceal the evidence of the dimensional collapse that had destabilised the spire."

traits.locale_text: {n}El xenos responde con una risa satisfecha.{/n} «El miedo es la reacción de una mente débil al enfrentarse a lo inconcebible. Incluso nuestros amos son susceptibles a él... Lo que me costó convencer a la Arconte de que trajera a los guerreros espirituales a la Ciudad Siniestra. Y después, de que ocultara las pruebas del colapso dimensional que ponía en peligro la torre».

languages.text: {n}Der Xenos antwortet mit einem selbstzufriedenen Lachen.{/n} "Furcht ist die Reaktion eines schwachen Verstandes angesichts des Unvermeidbaren. Selbst Eure Meister unterliegen ihr ... Oh, die Mühe, die es mich gekostet hat, den Archon zu überreden, die Geisterkrieger in die Dunkle Stadt zu führen. Um anschließend den Beweis für den dimensionalen Kollaps zu verbergen, der den Turm destabilisiert hatte."
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos responds with a self-satisfied chuckle.{/n} "Fear is the reaction of a weak mind presented with the inconceivable. Even our masters are liable to it... Oh, the pains it took me to convince the Archon to bring the spirit warriors into the Dark City. And to then conceal the evidence of the dimensional collapse that had destabilised the spire."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Xenos antwortet mit einem selbstzufriedenen Lachen.{/n} "Furcht ist die Reaktion eines schwachen Verstandes angesichts des Unvermeidbaren. Selbst Eure Meister unterliegen ihr ... Oh, die Mühe, die es mich gekostet hat, den Archon zu überreden, die Geisterkrieger in die Dunkle Stadt zu führen. Um anschließend den Beweis für den dimensionalen Kollaps zu verbergen, der den Turm destabilisiert hatte."

languages.text: {n}Zeno, kendinden hoşnut bir gülüşle karşılık veriyor.{/n} "Korku, zayıf bir zihnin anlamlandıramadığı şeylere karşı verdiği tepkidir. Efendilerimiz bile bu duygudan azade değillerdir... Arkon'u ruh savaşçılarını Kara Şehir'e getirmeye ikna etmek için neler çektim. Sonra bir de kulenin dengesini bozan boyutsal yıkımın kanıtlarını gizlemek için çaba sarf ettim."
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos responds with a self-satisfied chuckle.{/n} "Fear is the reaction of a weak mind presented with the inconceivable. Even our masters are liable to it... Oh, the pains it took me to convince the Archon to bring the spirit warriors into the Dark City. And to then conceal the evidence of the dimensional collapse that had destabilised the spire."

traits.locale_text: {n}Zeno kendinden hoşnut bir gülüşle karşılık veriyor.{/n} "Korku, zayıf bir zihnin anlamlandıramadığı bir şeye karşı verdiği tepkidir. Efendilerimiz bile bu duygudan azade değillerdir. Ah, Arkon'u ruh savaşçılarını Kara Şehir'e getirmeye ikna etmek için neler çektim. Sonra bir de kulenin dengesini bozan boyutsal yıkımın kanıtlarını gizlemek için çaba sarf ettim."
